item.title: Trump admin live updates: Gov. says 'no need' after Trump directs troops to Portland
item.description: President Trump on Saturday said he ordered the deployment of troops to Portland to combat alleged domestic terrorists.

item.title: UN imposes 'snapback' sanctions on Iran over its nuclear program
item.description: The United Nations has reimposed sanctions on Iran over its nuclear program
